weka.distributed.hadoop

Class HadoopJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.core.DistributedJob
      • weka.distributed.hadoop.HadoopJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, EnvironmentHandler, OptionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArffHeaderHadoopJob, CorrelationMatrixHadoopJob, KMeansClustererHadoopJob, RandomizedDataChunkHadoopJob, WekaClassifierEvaluationHadoopJob, WekaClassifierHadoopJob, WekaScoringHadoopJob

    public abstract class HadoopJob
extends distributed.core.DistributedJob
implements OptionHandler
    Abstract base class for Hadoop jobs. Contains routines for installing Weka libraries in HDFS, running jobs and getting status information on running jobs.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11837 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPathToWekaJar

        public java.lang.String getPathToWekaJar()
        Get the path to the weka.jar file. Will be populated automatically if the classpath contains a weka.jar. The weka.jar is installed in HDFS and used in the classpath for map and reduce tasks.
        Returns:
        the path to the weka.jar.

      • setPathToWekaJar

        public void setPathToWekaJar(java.lang.String path)
        Set the path to the weka.jar file. Will be populated automatically if the classpath contains a weka.jar. The weka.jar is installed in HDFS and used in the classpath for map and reduce tasks.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the weka.jar.

      • additionalWekaPackagesTipText

        public java.lang.String additionalWekaPackagesTipText()
        Tip text for this property.
        Returns:
        the tip text for this property.

      • getAdditionalWekaPackages

        public java.lang.String getAdditionalWekaPackages()
        Get a comma separated list of the names of additional weka packages to use with the job. Any jar files in the main package directory and the lib directory of the package will get installed in HDFS and placed in the classpath of map and reduce tasks
        Returns:
        a comma separated list of weka packages to use with the job

      • setAdditionalWekaPackages

        public void setAdditionalWekaPackages(java.lang.String packages)
        Set a comma separated list of the names of additional weka packages to use with the job. Any jar files in the main package directory and the lib directory of the package will get installed in HDFS and placed in the classpath of map and reduce tasks
        Parameters:
        packages - a comma separated list of weka packages to use with the job
